Description:
In-Zone beauty with scope
$650,000-$710,000
Respectfully renovated & artfully styled, this solid-brick c.1929 home is a divine Deco in the desirable McKinnon College Zone. Beyond dual leadlight doors, this gracious 3 bedroom home showcases glossy hardwood floors & elaborate ceilings across a grand plan with interconnected formal rooms featuring an impressive fireplace. But it's not all about period grace - beneath a cathedral ceiling, a modern casual area flows from timeless timber kitchen (with Smeg cooktop) to covered decking in lush gardens. With ducted heating, alarm, almost 4,000L of water-storage & 2-car auto-garage with workshop, this is the ideal place to enjoy Zone life ...with perfect potential to extend up or out.
3 bedrooms, classic bathroom, powder-rm
3,700L water store & deck in gorgeous gardens
2-car garage & workshop, duct-htg, alarm
edge of East-Brighton College Zone address

Description:
1st-Class Californian- inside & out!
This is period perfection in perfectly manicured gardens. Just around the corner from Ormond station & shops, this 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom Californian Bungalow offers a mix of traditional rooms (including a formal lounge with fireplace & beautiful media cabinetry) & casual living (with dining beside a sheltered courtyard & living beneath a soaring vaulted ceiling). With a WIR & discreet courtyard view ensuite, stone-finish & prestige appliance kitchen & step down wine-cellar, this first-class Californian is equally well-polished outside with an al fresco deck arching out into professionally landscaped, tank & drip watered gardens complete with loft-storage garage & carport.
3 bedrooms, ensuite, WIR, dual living
stone-finish kitchen, step-down wine-cellar
loft-store garage, carport, 5,000 L tanks
rev-cycle air-con, duct heating, fireplace

Description:
Affordable living & super convenient!
Peace of mind seldom come easier than this! Already tenanted, this naturally light and bright two bedroom unit features a large north-facing lounge with eat-in galley-style kitchen, a separate skylit laundry and private toilet. There's plenty of storage with built-in robes and extra cupboard space, while home comforts include heating, cooling, quality carpets and the added bonus of rear lane access for parking outside the back door! With a paved rear courtyard for private entertaining, this quality property is both a tenant-magnet and an appealing low-maintenance home in a super convenient spot, close to shops, station and public transport.
2 bedrooms with built-in robes, laundry, WC
north-facing living, eat-in galley kitchen rear lane car access - park at the back door!
steps to Ormond shops, station & transport

Description:
Top-of-the-class Zone address!
$720,000-$790,000
You can't get a surer spot in the McKinnon College Zone! Backing the College playing-fields just two doors from the gate, this family-wise home offers generous four bedroom, two bathroom accommodation within a traditional dual living plan. Polished up with all the beautiful detail intact, this charming home features a pretty ensuite for the bay-windowed master, a gracious lounge for parental peace, a generous dining area for the quality kitchen & playing-fields views for the spacious family zone. With family comforts including ducted heating, secure garage & around 7500sqft/690sqm of manicured gardens with a hot-tub summer-house, this is the place to zone in on a classic Californian!
4 bedroom, 2 bathrooms, (ensuite)
formal & family zones, large dining area
approx 7500sqft/690sqm gardens with spa, garage
backing McKinnon College close to entry

Description:
1st Class Californian in the Zone
$800,000-$880,000
This is period perfect living in the perfect College Zone location. Between the College & McKinnon Primary School, this first-class Californian Bungalow has been thoughtfully restored & extended to offer a 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom family plan on 690sqm featuring a bay-windowed formal lounge with elaborate open-fire, a fine dining-room through a fretworked arch & a relaxed casual zone - flowing out from a classic kitchen & stepping out to an entertaining-sized verandah above professionally landscaped gardens. With an impressive 900mm a Germania range, ducted heating plus air-conditioning & generous offstreet parking, there's all a family needs to live in period perfection in the Zone.
4 bedrooms, 2 period-style bathrooms, 690sqm
lounge, dining, family & al fresco zones
la Germania range, heating, air-con
Zone location between the College & the PS

Description:
Original, affordable & In-Zone!
$370,000-$410,000
This is the College-zoned period home you thought you couldn't afford! Offered in absolutely original condition, this charming Edwardian cottage is a rare renovation opportunity indeed. The original home on a dual occupancy site, this 2 bedroom beauty retains perfectly-sized, old-fashioned established gardens & perfectly pretty period detail including lovely leadlight, wonderfully well-proportioned rooms & a pretty facade. Step right up & return this charmer to its original glory or step out into this compact site & see the potential for an exciting entry to In-Zone development. With Ormond's strip & station so close & a coveted McKinnon College Zone address ...you can't afford to miss this!
charming 2 bedroom Edwardian
original home on dual occupancy site
ready to renovate with lovely detail
walk to station, College Zone location

Rich with potential & plans!
Discover a hidden treasure! This brilliant approx 7980sqft/738sqm 3 bedroom solid brick period home is as spacious inside as out & glitters with potential for further development! The sizeable bedrooms with robes, updated kitchen & separate lounge & dining rooms are big enough for everyone to stake their claim, while the kids will love playing make-believe in their expansive back garden. Take advantage of this terrific opportunity to dream up your own plans for a new 2-storey rear home with 3 bedrooms & a study- Subject to council approval. Your windfall doesn't stop there - because it's only a short jaunty stroll to the nearby Ormond station & shops!

Description:
Zoned Family Corporate Quality Entertainer!
For All Your Real Estate Needs, contact Eric Cohen on 95780909 Today.
Featuring a grandeur of almost 30 squares, this townhouse is inviting todays corporate family to take possession of this as new, modern, family living in the McKinnon School zone.
Offering the spirit of family lifestyle entertaining, this architecturally designed, 4 bedroom home provides the luxury and quality you deserve.
Sitting on a generous land of 349.3sqm, with plenty of rear yard, a north frontage and built by a local renowned builder who recognizes quality and the highest desire of families coming into the McKinnon school zone area, this home offers exceptional finishes accommodating the four bedrooms, three bathrooms and duel internal living areas in harmony with external living.
Ideally located between the new and future McKinnon secondary campuses, guarantees your investment long term.
A grand entry of high 3m ceilings and warm timber oak floorboards lead to and accompanied by an open study. A lockable single remote garage with storage.
An open plan family living leads out to a grand size alfresco 130mm wood deck and outside living area of more than 100sqm.
In the local Valkstone Primary zoning, McKinnon Secondary 600m away, walking distance to McKinnon oval & playground, GESAC and access to Centre Road shops, train transport and much more.
Please contact agent for further information and viewing regarding this property.

Description:
INTERESTED IN THIS PROPERTY? PLEASE RING SARAH KORBEL - 0415 393 898!
Period Perfection with Contemporary Class
A private family sanctuary on a coveted corner block, this stylishly updated 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom Spanish Mission sensation is perfectly placed to highlight generously scaled living zones, quality finishes, and seamless indoor-outdoor transition.
Beyond an arched and elevated porch entry, discover far-reaching depth and wide open space in beautifully accommodating living and dining zones beneath soaring ceilings. A recently refreshed kitchen benefits from the full suite of high-end Asko appointments including twin ovens (electric and steam) a dishwasher, and an easy-clean induction cook top. Chef-friendly from top to bottom, take full advantage of an insinkerator, plenty of room for a double fridge, ample pantry space, and a sparkling series of stone bench tops.
A light-filled and air-conditioned family retreat fully opens up to reveal a sheltered alfresco deck, brilliantly book-ended by a sun lounge and a fire-pit area. Free-flowing and north-facing, make every social event an occasion in a privately peaceful outdoor oasis sure to be used on a daily basis.
The inspired, thoughtful layout accentuates family-sized space without sacrificing natural light. All 3 bedrooms are a testament to this with the roomy main boasting a fully tiled ensuite featuring a separate WC and huge wardrobe space. A skylit principal bathroom features a shower over a bath, while a recently renovated laundry is graced with a fully tiled, walk-in shower plus a stone-finished vanity.
Special features include ducted heating plus 3 split-system heating/cooling units and additional panel heating in the retreat, an outdoor shower, recessed down-lighting, a garden shed, original decorative ceilings, and off-street parking for 3 cars beyond auto-gated entry. The property is further enhanced by a number of updates and upgrades. Newly restumped, rewired and replumbed, enjoy brand-new, wide-board oak flooring, plantation shutters, sliding glass doors, fencing, and a freshly landscaped garden.
Pretty-as-a-picture over an impressive 540sqm (approx.), convenience is a constant in the tightly held Dendy Park precinct. Stroll to St Leonards College, Haileybury and Brighton Secondary College, lush parkland, and Hampton Street shopping. Make no mistake, this Mission is possible!
At a glance...
* 3 bedrooms with extensive built-in robes, main with fully tiled ensuite featuring a separate WC
* Spacious and skylit open-plan lounge/dining and stylish feature lighting
* Designer stone-topped kitchen featuring high-end Asko appliances including twin ovens - electric and steam, dishwasher and an easy-clean induction cooktop plus ample bench and storage space
* Air-conditioned family retreat with integrated cabinetry
* Skylit, fully tiled, family-sized bathroom with shower over bath and handy shower niche
* Recently renovated laundry with a fully tiled walk-in shower plus a stone-finished vanity
* Off-street parking for 3 cars beyond auto-gated entry
* Sheltered and powered alfresco deck plus a sun lounge and fire-pit area
* Outdoor shower
* Meticulously landscaped, low-maintenance garden with shed
* Ducted heating plus split-system heating/cooling and panel heating
* Recessed down-lighting
* New wide-board oak flooring
* Original decorative ceilings with exquisite period detail
* Brand-new plantation shutters and roller blinds
* Moments from parkland, schools, shopping, restaurants, beach and transport

Description:
Summer days made easy and a park at your doorstep
Showcasing outstanding attention to detail and quality finishes, this four bedroom, three bathroom residence is graced with beautiful established landscaped gardens. Embrace the northerly aspect from the stunning alfresco entertainment area overlooking the heated pool complemented by a frameless glass pool fence.
The light filled open plan living area incorporates integrated living zones, finished with designer epoxy floors, Caesarstone gourmet kitchen accompanied with butler's pantry, built in wine storage, electronic device docking stations and remote gas stainless steel fireplace.
A black Japanese oak staircase opens up onto an informal leisure/retreat, adjoined by the master bedroom comprising a walk-in dressing room and ensuite, there are two further double bedrooms separated by a spacious bathroom featuring an elegant free-standing bath.
The ground floor offers a second master bedroom with ensuite, a study and direct garage access.
- Zoned gas ducted heating and refrigerated cooling
- Coloured Video Intercom
- Security System
- Serviced BBQ area
- Plumbed refrigerator recess
- Sonos sound bars located throughout the home
- A moment's walk to GESAC and Bailey Reserve playing fields
- Located in the Coatesville Primary School Zone
- Please note photos are from a previous sale campaign

Description:
Single Level Family Perfection by the Park
*REGISTRATION REQUIRED TO BOOK INSPECTION | CONTACT AGENT TO REGISTER*
Superbly crafted to create a home of innovation, inspiration and immaculate beauty, this stunning 3 bedroom + study 2 bathroom clinker brick treasure is in a sea of manicured gardens and secure surrounds. With every detail created for purpose and ease, this quality renovation features a secluded entry, expansive open plan living & dining (TV cabinetry) centred around a cleverly designed stone kitchen with ZUG appliances (steam/combi oven, convection oven, warming drawer, induction cooktop), Asko dishwasher, corner pantry and extensive fitted storage; a beautiful main bedroom with designer WIR and luxe ensuite; 2 further double bedrooms (one with BIRs), a stylishly concealed study nook, brilliant bathroom and a superb laundry (hamper drawer). Bi-fold doors open to a generous alfresco deck with Eclipse automated lourve pergola (rain-sensored) in a glorious lawned garden with hedged borders. With no expense spared, this heartwarming single level abode is beautifully finished with Tasmanian Oak floors, superb Rosewood timber double glazed windows throughout, customized cabinetry, security door entry, hydronic heating, ducted R/C air conditioning, double blinds, Villeroy & Boch basins, Velux windows (automated shades), video intercom, instant hot water with temperature control, 2 water tanks, a double auto garage behind 2 sets of auto gates (parking for 7) and a workshop. Almost opposite Victory Park, nestled between Dendy Park and Patterson station, walk to local cafes, shops, kinder, Brighton Secondary College, Bentleigh West Primary School & childcare.
Insights: 22 Patterson Road, Bentleigh VIC 3204 was last sold in 2009 and 88 other 3 bedroom house in Bentleigh have recently been sold.

Description:
Scaling New Heights Of Design & Luxury (VIRTUAL INSPECTION SATURDAY 26th of SEP @ 10:15AM
This sophisticated, new architect-designed town residence showcases a unique state-of-the-art design and excels for magnificent family living.
Delivering all the space and style you want in a luxury home, including a high standard of features and contemporary finishes, soaring high entry void, towering cathedral ceilings and outdoor living tailor-made for entertaining.
Be impressed by the monochromatic Bosch kitchen with plenty of storage and breakfast bench, and huge open-plan living/dining zone, seamlessly connected via sliding doors to a private landscaped deck and courtyard.
A second living room with built-in desk opens to a private outdoor deck, enhancing lifestyle flexibility and adds a further outdoor entertaining option.
On the upper-level you will be in awe of the hotel-style main bedroom, incorporating an extensive built-in robe and sublime twin ensuite, complemented by 3 additional robed bedrooms, fully-tiled bathroom of premium quality, intimate deck, study nook, powder room, heating/AC, alarm, single lock up garage and beautiful landscaped gardens.
Enjoy a coveted location, a short walk to GSAC, Centre Road shops, Bentleigh Train Station, quality schools, various bus routes and Centenary Park.
